name: Lord of the Flies (IanTheBee)
description:
Your goal is to kill the Lord of the Flies, the king, in this turn based puzzle game.
If you get a glitch where you cannot move, my apologies. Reload the page to fix.

LEFT CLICK to shoot your tongue

WASD to move

RIGHT CLICK to shoot eaten flies


Some enemies have shields, and cannot be eaten. You'll need to shoot them to break their shields. The king will be heavily fortified with shields, so you'll need to carefully plan your actions to win.
